attributes.action: Please make all private parking enforcenemt illegal
attributes.additional_details: People are been hit with fraudulent fines for parking to the requirements of the carpark, their reasoning is rouge wardens but this simply cant be. How many more people have been hit and just paid up without complaining. The system to fight the fines is flawed with these bogus fines been approved as correct.Please make all private parking enforcement illegal as they are defrauding the UK people. If we take money by deception then we go to jail, they do it they walk away with no proper punishment
attributes.background: People are been hit with fraudulent fines for parking to the requirements of the carpark, their reasoning is rouge wardens but this simply cant be. Please make all private parking enforcement illegal as they are defrauding the UK people.
